author: pbr
title: ok set, good for parts
review:
I bought this set mostly for the parts, and I'm happy with the value from that angle.


The wind-up motor to spin the wheel is kind of lame.


The red flames are useful with 2 90 degree joiners ('Technic Angle Connector #6' 32014) - together the 2 "v"s make good "legs" for a mindstorms NXT controller.  They put the controller at a nice angle for viewing the screen.


The wheels/tires and body parts of the car are useful for building robots, as are the parts that make the "slammer" and the parts that make the base for the wheel.
